name: chasing-chapters
description: A blank template to get started with Payload 3.0

scripts.test: pnpm run test:int && pnpm run test:e2e
scripts.test:e2e: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--no-deprecation --no-experimental-strip-types" pnpm exec playwright test --config=playwright.config.ts
scripts.test:e2e:headed: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--no-deprecation --no-experimental-strip-types" pnpm exec playwright test --config=playwright.config.ts --headed
scripts.test:e2e:debug: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--no-deprecation --no-experimental-strip-types" pnpm exec playwright test --config=playwright.config.ts --debug
scripts.test:e2e:chrome: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--no-deprecation --no-experimental-strip-types" pnpm exec playwright test --config=playwright.config.ts --project=chromium
scripts.test:e2e:firefox: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--no-deprecation --no-experimental-strip-types" pnpm exec playwright test --config=playwright.config.ts --project=firefox
scripts.test:e2e:safari: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--no-deprecation --no-experimental-strip-types" pnpm exec playwright test --config=playwright.config.ts --project=webkit
scripts.test:e2e:mobile: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--no-deprecation --no-experimental-strip-types" pnpm exec playwright test --config=playwright.config.ts --project=mobile-chrome --project=mobile-safari
scripts.test:e2e:accessibility: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--no-deprecation --no-experimental-strip-types" pnpm exec playwright test --config=playwright.config.ts --project=accessibility
scripts.test:coverage: pnpm run test:int:coverage && pnpm run test:e2e
scripts.docker:reset: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml down -v && docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml up -d
scripts.perf:build: pnpm run build && pnpm run analyze
scripts.perf:test: pnpm run build && pnpm run lighthouse
scripts.test:performance: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--no-deprecation --no-experimental-strip-types" pnpm exec playwright test tests/performance --config=playwright.config.ts --project=chromium
scripts.test:security: pnpm audit --audit-level moderate && pnpm run security:scan
scripts.prod:deploy: pnpm run build && pnpm run test && pnpm run prod:health
